title: Receive a request and return a response over HTTP or HTTPS
description: This workflow template triggers when a message or request arrives over HTTP or HTTPS and returns a response after any other actions that you might want to add for the workflow to run.
detailsDescription: This template serves as a starting point for you to build synchronous Request-Response workflow patterns using Azure Logic Apps. [Learn more](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2282330)
